name: Holster Films
slogan: Interniship at a London productionj house
description: We create exciting content for our clients such as; watches, alcohol, fitness, tech, and travel.

jobs.title: Sales Executive - Business Development
jobs.description:
This role is for someone who's looking to get into the world of sales and potentially video production.

The day to day role will be working with Mike Scott (Partner - Producer/Sales) to expand existing leads and explore new opportunities. You will be required to pick up the phone, send emails, come to trade shows, client meetings and, prepare pitches.

This is a very hands-on/get stuck in role. We are looking to grow Hoster Films, and at the current growth rate and production, I can not keep up with
all of my sales/biz development responsibility and need some help.

We have a lovely open plan office space in Victoria right next to the station and have a relaxed (work hard play hard) atmosphere.

This is an unpaid role (London travel covered), but there is a commission structure with meetings set up and deals signed.

This is the exact style role I took on for my year's placement whilst at uni. That role has helped me to a position where I own my own company in under 10 years.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Cheers,

Mike
